actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to equalize the retired pay of members of the uniformed services retired prior to June 1, 1958, whose retired pay is computed on laws enacted on or after October 1, 1949.

summary.text: Provides for the recomputation of the retired pay of members of the uniformed services retired prior to June 1, 1958, whose retired pay is computed on laws enacted on or after October 1, 1949. States that nothing in this Act shall operate to reduce the retired pay of former members of the uniformed services.

titles.title: A bill to equalize the retired pay of members of the uniformed services retired prior to June 1, 1958, whose retired pay is computed on laws enacted on or after October 1, 1949.
